full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 759 Filed 08/10/22 Page 128 of 267 2156 LCACmax5 A. Farmer - cross 1 (Jury present) 2 THE COURT: Good afternoon, members of the jury. Hope you had a good lunch. Appreciate your continued attention, diligence, and patience. 5 Ms. Menninger, you may continue with your cross examination. 7 Ms. Farmer, I remind you, you are under oath. You may inquire. 9 MS. MENNINGER: Thank you, your Honor. 10 BY MS. MENNINGER: 11 Q. Before you traveled from Arizona to New Mexico, I believe you testified you did not talk to Jeffrey Epstein about the trip to New Mexico; correct? 13 A. That's right. 15 Q. So, because you did not talk to him about the trip, 16 Mr. Epstein did not tell you that Ms. Maxwell would be in New Mexico; correct? 18 A. Mr. Epstein did not. 19 Q. Mr. Epstein. I apologize. Thank you. Did not tell you Ms. Maxwell would be there? 21 A. Correct. 22 Q. And you did not talk to Ms. Maxwell ever before you arrived in New Mexico; correct? 24 A. Correct. 25 Q. The information about the New Mexico trip came from your SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00016344
